column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ozai says : " Why are you here ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " I 'm here to tell the truth . "
#Text=Ozai says : " Telling the truth during the middle of an eclipse .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Why would she lie to me about that ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Because the Avatar 's not dead .
#Text=He survived .
#Text=" Ozai says : " What ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " In fact , he 's probably leading this invasion .
#Text=He could be on his way here right now .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Get out !
#Text=Get out of my sight right now if you know what 's good for you !
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's another thing .
#Text=I 'm not taking orders from you anymore .
#Text=" Ozai says : " You will obey me , or this defiant breath will be your last !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Think again .
#Text=I am going to speak my mind , and you are going to listen .
#Text="
